0:
I help people to make consistent, increasing, reliable income from trading/investing in Stocks/Forex.

My story 8 years ago before I started trading
* Came from a broke & broken Asian family where my parents always argued about money
* graduated from Imperial College London but found myself unfulfilled in my toxic job
- still broke, no time to spend with my family
- one day, one of my family members passed away and I didn't get to see her as I was busy rat racing
-  regret
- enough. I persuaded some of the greatest living traders/investors around the world to mentor me 1to1 their best trading strategies. 
⁣⁣
Today
- I became a multimillionaire and grew my trading/investing portfolio to £5 million at the age of 30.
- retired my parents, bought them a house, travel them around the world
- i found my purpose after transforming my family/friends lives by teaching them
- successfully train hundreds of beginners to make more income from trading/investing than their full-time job/business
